title: Darwin's finches: clues to the origin of species
creator_credit: Herbert Schick and Film Associates of California
brief_description: A simple introduction to the evidence in the Galapagos Islands fauna which Darwin first interpreted as due to natural selection of variants, particularly the adaptive radiation of the finches and iguanas into different ecological roles. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
